j.opt

Annotation Type Option


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Option
    Represents an option field

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Description of this option.
      java.lang.String name
      Name of the switch.
      boolean required
      Whether this option must be specified.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Name of the switch. For e.g., if the switch is "-t", then the name would be "t". This can have more than one character.

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Description of this option. For e.g., "number of threads"

      • required

        public abstract boolean required
        Whether this option must be specified.
